de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.gdbscan

Interface CorePredicate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FourCCorePredicate, MinPtsCorePredicate, PreDeConCorePredicate

    public interface CorePredicate
    Predicate for GeneralizedDBSCAN to evaluate whether a point is a core point or not. Note the Factory/Instance split of this interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  CorePredicate.Instance<T>
      Instance for a particular data set.
